name: @esengine/ecs-framework-monorepo
description: ECS Framework Monorepo - 高性能ECS框架及其网络插件

scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:math && npm run build:network-shared && npm run build:network-client && npm run build:network-server
scripts.build:npm: npm run build:npm:core && npm run build:npm:math && npm run build:npm:network-shared && npm run build:npm:network-client && npm run build:npm:network-server
scripts.docs:api:extract: npm run docs:api:extract:core && npm run docs:api:extract:math && npm run docs:api:extract:network-shared
scripts.docs:api:document: npm run docs:api:document:core && npm run docs:api:document:math && npm run docs:api:document:network-shared && npm run docs:api:cleanup
scripts.docs:api:document:core: mkdir -p temp/api-model-core && cp temp/api-model/ecs-framework-core.api.json temp/api-model-core/ && npx api-documenter markdown -i temp/api-model-core -o docs/api/core
scripts.docs:api:document:math: mkdir -p temp/api-model-math && cp temp/api-model/ecs-framework-math.api.json temp/api-model-math/ && npx api-documenter markdown -i temp/api-model-math -o docs/api/math
scripts.docs:api:document:network-shared: mkdir -p temp/api-model-network-shared && cp temp/api-model/ecs-framework-network-shared.api.json temp/api-model-network-shared/ && npx api-documenter markdown -i temp/api-model-network-shared -o docs/api/network-shared
scripts.docs:api: npm run build:core && npm run build:math && npm run build:network-shared && npm run docs:api:extract && npm run docs:api:document
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:api && vitepress build docs
scripts.publish:all: npm run prepare:publish && npm run publish:all:dist
scripts.publish:all:dist: npm run publish:core && npm run publish:math && npm run publish:network-shared && npm run publish:network-client && npm run publish:network-server

author: yhh
